price: 21. Of denken degenen die zonden betrachten dat Wij hen gelijk zullen stellen met degenen die geloven en goede daden verrichten – zowel in hun huidige leven als na hun dood? Slecht is het wat zij oordelen.
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna ij'taraḥū al-sayiāti an najʿalahum ka-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sawāan maḥyāhum wamamātuhum sāa mā yaḥkumūna
